name: Steak, Mushroom and Cheese Pizza

ingredients.name: Pizza Seasoning or Marinara Sauce Mix
flank steak
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cooked and thinly sliced against the grain

preparation: Combine first 4 ingredients in a small mixing bowl and set aside.
Place pizza shell on parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Top with sauce, steak, mushrooms and cheese. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until crust is golden and crisp and cheese is melted.
tips: Dish up with a big leafy green salad.
Mix finely diced artichokes into your pizza sauce – picky eaters will love the flavour and won’t know they’re there!

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavor of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
